description: Load a single-band GeoTiff raster into bigquery
name: Geotiff to Bigquery

parameters.helpText: Google Cloud Storage URL of GeoTIFF raster, e.g. gs://<bucket>/<path>
parameters.label: gcs_url
parameters.name: gcs_url

parameters.helpText: Bigquery Dataset that contains your destination table
parameters.label: dataset
parameters.name: dataset

parameters.helpText: The name of the column that will store your raster band data values
parameters.label: band column
parameters.name: band_column

parameters.helpText: The number of the band to read from the raster
parameters.label: band number
parameters.name: band_number

parameters.helpText: True to skip/ignore NODATA values from raster
parameters.label: skip nodata
parameters.name: skip_nodata

parameters.helpText: True to store only the centroid rather than the entire polygon
parameters.label: centroid only
parameters.name: centroid_only

parameters.helpText: The EPSG code for the input coordinate reference system
parameters.label: in_epsg
parameters.name: in_epsg
